Meta.title: ONYX — nicotine-free hookah mix
Meta.description: ONYX creates a next-generation atmosphere: nicotine-free hookah products based on hibiscus with natural flavors. Pure taste, vibrant vibe, and an entirely new style of relaxation.

Modals.productPlaced: This resource contains products intended for adults.
Modals.toContinue: To continue, please confirm your age.

HeaderSection.title: ONYX — it’s a vibe
HeaderSection.subTitle: Neon, style, atmosphere. We’re not like the others — and neither are you.

1.title: Fiery character
1.description: ONYX easily takes three coals. Want heat? You’ll get it.

2.title: Says "MANGO"? You’ll get mango
2.description: No surprises. What’s on the label is exactly what you’ll taste.

3.title: A session that doesn’t end
3.description: Up to 2 hours of stable vibes. No need to repack.

4.title: Not chemistry — Aesthetics
4.description: Fruits taste like fruits. Berries like they’re from the forest. Naturalness always sounds better.

5.title: A lot — and that’s putting it mildly
5.description: ONYX fills the space with smoke so thick it becomes part of it.

6.title: A hookah that doesn’t need care
6.description: ONYX is heat-resistant, stable, and requires no attention. Perfect for hookah lounges and HoReCa.

pinkman.name: Pinkman
pinkman.description: Grapefruit, raspberry, and strawberry: a bright tangy-berry wave with a clean citrus finish, without cloying sweetness

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Intense ice effect without its own flavor; adds deep coolness to any mix and refreshes solo

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: Ripe banana with soft creaminess on the exhale and a rounded, sweet aftertaste

energy.name: Energy
energy.description: Classic energy drink taste: citrus sweetness and a tonic spark, without bitterness

kiwi.name: Kiwi
kiwi.description: Juicy kiwi with a precise sweet-sour balance and fresh green notes; universal for mixes

lemongrass.name: Lemongrass
lemongrass.description: Herbal-citrus freshness with a light tea shade; very refreshing

strawberry.name: Strawberry
strawberry.description: Ripe strawberry with natural berry flavor and a clean profile — no artificial notes

lemon.name: Lemon
lemon.description: Bright lemon with expressive citrus and a clean, pleasantly tart aftertaste

peach.name: Peach Tea
peach.description: Smooth black tea with ripe peach; no chill, long velvety aftertaste

pineapple.name: Pineapple
pineapple.description: That very taste of pineapple rings: juicy, tropical-bright, with a light sourness.

mango.name: Mango Yogurt
mango.description: Dessert mango with creamy-yogurt notes; rich and delicate profile

grape.name: Grape
grape.description: Ripe dark grapes: juicy start and light skin tartness, without candy-like artificiality

wild.name: Wild Strawberry
wild.description: Fragrant wild strawberry with a delicate tartness and a natural ‘field’ character

messages.1: Hello, Miami! I want to order ONYX...
messages.2: Remember when we were analog? Need a hookah...
messages.3: Outrun the night with ONYX tobacco...
messages.4: Neon lights, late nights, and your tobacco...
messages.5: Drive through the city with a new flavor...
messages.6: Cyberdyne Systems approved! But first, a hookah...
messages.7: VHS quality, the future of taste...
messages.8: Ready for 2085? Let’s start with ONYX...
